name: Shiftit (ancientpixel)
description:
this project is inspired by Nebulus for the C64, Fez and the famous Rubics Cube. It uses similar puzzlemechanics is used for DefragMe in the beginning and thus is called shiftit, like DefragMe was called originally. However tonewise, it goes in a completely different direction, with more character and colours.
The playingfield moves like a sphere projected onto a cylinder. It wraps around horizontally and vertically.

Since this is a prototype i dont show any story and just want to test the gameplay. Please test this thing and comment about your experience :)
